/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ex4_firstTriangleMesh.dir/cuda_compile_ptx_1_generated_devicePrograms.cu.ptx_embedded.c.o CMakeFiles/ex4_firstTriangleMesh.dir/SampleRenderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ex4_firstTriangleMesh.dir/main.cpp.o  -o ../ex4_firstTriangleMesh -Wl,-rpath,/home/iwald/OPTIX/current/lib64 ../libgdt.a /home/iwald/OPTIX/current/lib64/liboptix.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt -lcuda ../libglfWindow.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglfw.so.3.2 -lGL
